resource.description: A resource schema representing a Lake Formation Tag.

properties.name: CatalogId
properties.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, the account ID. The Data Catalog is the persistent metadata store. It contains database definitions, table definitions, and other control information to manage your Lake Formation environment.

type.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, the account ID. The Data Catalog is the persistent metadata store. It contains database definitions, table definitions, and other control information to manage your Lake Formation environment.

properties.name: TagValues
properties.description: A list of possible values an attribute can take.

type.description: A list of possible values an attribute can take.
